description:
Generate a modern, responsive website using pure HTML and CSS (no frameworks).

Business Type:
Dairy Farm

Description:
A dairy farm producing fresh milk, curd, butter, paneer, and ghee using hygienic,
natural, and sustainable farming practices. The farm focuses on quality,
animal care, and farm-to-home delivery.

Target Audience:
Families, local customers, organic food buyers

Tone:
Natural, trustworthy, healthy, rural-modern

Website Sections:
- Hero section with farm and cows imagery
- About the dairy farm and its values
- Products section (Milk, Curd, Butter, Paneer, Ghee)
- Quality & hygiene process
- Testimonials from customers
- Call-to-action for home delivery or contact
- Footer with address and contact info

Design Preferences:
- Green, white, and light brown color palette
- Clean typography
- Natural and fresh look
- Mobile-first and fully responsive

Output:
Provide complete HTML and CSS code in separate files.

pages.name: home
pages.purpose: Introduce the dairy farm, its products, and core values with a focus on quality and natural practices.

pages.name: products
pages.purpose: Showcase detailed information about each dairy product offered.

pages.name: about_us
pages.purpose: Share the farm's story, commitment to animal welfare, sustainable practices, and core values.

pages.name: quality_hygiene
pages.purpose: Detail the farm's stringent quality control, hygiene practices, and farm-to-home delivery process.

pages.name: contact
pages.purpose: Provide customers with ways to inquire, place orders, and connect with the farm.
